description:
Manual games allow you to set custom check locations and custom item names that will be rolled into a multiworld.
This allows any variety of game -- PC, console, board games, Microsoft Word memes... really anything -- to be part of a multiworld randomizer.
The key component to including these games is some level of manual restriction. Since the items are not actually withheld from the player,
the player must manually refrain from using these gathered items until the tracker shows that they have been acquired or sent.

0.19.description:
## APWorld Changes
* Added new duties
  * Yuweyawata Field Station
  * The Minstrel’s Ballad: Sphene's Burden
  * Jeuno: The First Walk
* Fixed typo in the FATE "Harder, Bigger, Faster, Stronger"
* Out-of-logic combat classes are now marked as filler.  This should make generation slightly faster.

0.19.1.description:
## APWorld changes
* Fixed connection to Shaaloani.  Northern Tural is no longer detached from everything.

0.19.2.description:
## APWorld changes

* Fix for Manual Launcher component.

0.19.3.description:
## APWorld changes
None

## Plugin Changes

We now have a working Duty Finder icon.  Duties with the "Chaotic Bonus" icon are in logic and incomplete.  

This replaces the Faux hollows fox, who is no longer in the textures for Duty Finder 😞

0.19.5.description:
## Client Updates
* Deathlink Support!  You can now kill your friends.  They can't kill you back, for obvious reasons.
* Link to setup guide in plugin UI
* Fixed Queue Amnesty failing to send duties that start with the word "The"
* Coloured chat.  Let me know if you don't like this, I can make it togglable if needed.

0.20.0.description:
## APWorld Changes

* More Fish!  You asked for Dawntrail Fish, I added them, and also some lower level fish that slipped though my hands the first time around.
* Yaml simplification.  Fishsanity is one one Choice, rather than a few separate toggles.  Hopefully it's more intuitive now.


## Plugin Changes
* Toggle to always enable deathlink, regardess of yaml setting.
* Toggle to ignore class restrictions.  You can now bend the rules to grind those fates with an Atma weapon.  
  * Note: The Level Cap still applies, it's just applied a bit more loosely.

0.21.0.description:
## APWorld changes

* Level Cap is now working again!  Thanks to @gaithern for the help 😃

0.21.1.description:
## APWorld changes
* If you provide more than five forced classes, we'll now choose five of them to be progression.  (Putting eleven jobs there causes generation issues)
* Fixed the names of two La Noscean Fates. 

## Plugin changes
* Added backwards compatibility for the above fixed fates.

0.21.2.description:
## APWorld Changes
* Fixed bug when both Fishsanity and Level Cap were set
* Fix unreachable locations and starting class levels not being added to start inventory by @Mysteryem in https://github.com/silasary/APxiv/pull/7
* Fixed more FATE names by @SL-Onstwedder in https://github.com/silasary/APxiv/pull/10 and https://github.com/silasary/APxiv/pull/11

## Client Changes
* Fixed Fate names
* Fixed bug in Queue Amnesty where you could sometimes send an out of logic check.

## New Contributors
* @Mysteryem made their first contribution in https://github.com/silasary/APxiv/pull/7
* @SL-Onstwedder made their first contribution in https://github.com/silasary/APxiv/pull/10

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/silasary/APxiv/compare/0.21.1...0.21.2

0.22.0.description:
## APWorld Changes
* Configurable FATE count.  You can now have anywhere between 0 and 10 FATEs per zone.
* Fixed the names of Second Coil Savage

## Plugin Changes
* Fixed race condition in Queue Amnesty
* Fixed The _Whorleater_ not sending

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/silasary/APxiv/compare/0.21.2...0.22.0

0.23.0.description:
## APWorld Changes
* Added Long Live the Coeurl (FATE), Coeurls Chase Boys (FATE), and Nothing Like a Trappin' Life (FATE) to the list of Worldboss fates.
* Added the 7.2 dutes "The Underkeep", "Recollection", and AAC Cruiserweight
* Removed the FATEs Poor Maid's Misadventure and Bad Breath in Paradise, as they appear to not exist anymore.

## Client Changes
* We're in the official repo now!  Enable "Get Plugin Testing Builds" in the Experimental tab, then install it like any other plugin!
(You can and should remove the custom repo now)
* Api V12 and 7.2 support

0.23.2.description:
## APWorld Changes
* Removed the 2013 Seasonal FATE "Return of the King".  

## Client Changes
* Overhauled the FATE code to be much more resilient to capitalisation and comma mismatches.
* Added a Password field, for people who needed one

### Client Changes in 0.22.1
* Fixed crash when sending checks on a background thread

0.24.0.description:
## APWorld Changes

* Added new Big Fish for 7.2
* Removed fish that required specific stages of the Splendorous Relic quest.

0.26.0.description:
* Added the 7.35 trial Windward Wilds
* Added the 7.4 MSQ dungeon and trial
* Added new setting to only select a random subset of all duties from an expansion (ie, only a handful of ARR dungeons instead of all of them)
* Added new setting to add extra checks for completing dungeons
* Fixed bug with `max_party_size` setting not being applied correctly
* Fixed Universal Tracker compatibility
0.26.0.title: v0.26.0

0.26.1.description: Fixed a handful of generation errors related to lower level caps
0.26.1.title: AP XIV v0.26.1
